channel.title: Building a Arcade machine
channel.description: Well as you read in the title, i am building a full sized arcade machine (games will run using MAME) And it will need to run a linux operating system, but i dont know which distro to install on it. (im using [url=http://www.anti-particle.com/wahcade.shtml]http://www.anti-particle.com/wahcade.shtml[/url] wahcade for the front end (so i think it only needs to be text based (correct me if im wrong) but yeah, what distro would you think would emulate arcade games well?

item.title: Building a Arcade machine
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I agree with Unhandled, just use whatever you are comfortable with and have the hardware for.

Read full topic

item.title: Building a Arcade machine
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

Well as you read in the title, i am building a full sized arcade machine (games will run using MAME)
And it will need to run a linux operating system, but i dont know which distro to install on it.
(im using http://www.anti-particle.com/wahcade.shtml wahcade for the front end (so i think it only needs to be text based (correct me if im wrong) but yeah, what distro would you think would emulate arcade games well?
